response.original_title: 青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない
response.overview: In Fujisawa, Sakuta Azusagawa is in his second year of high school. Blissful days with his girlfriend and upperclassman, Mai Sakurajima, are interrupted by the appearance of his first crush, Shoko Makinohara.
response.title: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl
